title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XXXIII, pt. 2053 - Personal Privacy Protection Regulations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XXXIII, pt. 2053 - Personal Privacy Protection Regulations

State Regulations
§ 2053.1 - Purpose and scope; general provisions
§ 2053.2 - Definitions
§ 2053.3 - Notification to data subjects
§ 2053.4 - Disclosure of records or personal information
§ 2053.5 - Designation and responsibilities of privacy compliance officer
§ 2053.6 - Proof of identity
§ 2053.7 - Location of records and hours for public inspection and copying
§ 2053.8 - Requests for records
§ 2053.9 - Amendment of records
§ 2053.10 - Denial of request for a record or amendment or correction of a record or personal information
§ 2053.11 - Appeal
§ 2053.12 - Statement of disagreement by data subject
§ 2053.13 - Fees
§ 2053.14 - Accounting for certain disclosures
§ 2053.15 - Privacy impact statements
§ 2053.16 - Annual reports
§ 2053.17 - No waiver
§ 2053.18 - Severability

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 21, ch. XXXIII, pt. 2053

Statutory authority: Public Officers Law, art. 6-A
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
